title: Sensitivity
name: general:sensitivity
description: Mouse sensitivity (legacy, may cause bugs if not 1, prefer input:sensitivity)

title: Border Size
name: general:border_size
description: Size of the border around windows

title: Border on Floating Windows
name: general:no_border_on_floating
description: Disable borders for floating windows

title: Gap inside
name: general:gaps_in
description: Gaps between windows

title: Gap outside
name: general:gaps_out
description: Gaps between windows and monitor edges

title: Gap between workspaces
name: general:gaps_workspaces
description: Gaps between workspaces. Stacks with gaps_out.

title: Inactive Window Border Color
name: general:col.inactive_border
description: Border color for inactive windows

title: Active Window Border Color
name: general:col.active_border
description: Border color for the active window

title: Inactive Nogroup Border Color
name: general:col.nogroup_border
description: Inactive border color for window that cannot be added to a group

title: Active Nogroup Border Color
name: general:col.nogroup_border_active
description: Active border color for window that cannot be added to a group

title: Cursor Inactive Timeout
name: general:cursor_inactive_timeout
description: Time in seconds for cursor inactivity before hiding (set to 0 for never)

title: Layout
name: general:layout
description: Layout to use (dwindle or master)

title: Disable Cursor Warp
name: general:no_cursor_warp
description: Prevents cursor warping in specific situations

title: Disable Focus Fallback
name: general:no_focus_fallback
description: Prevents fallback to next window when moving focus without available options

title: Apply Sensitivity to Raw Mouse Output
name: general:apply_sens_to_raw
description: Applies sensitivity to raw mouse output in games (NOT recommended)

title: Resize on Border
name: general:resize_on_border
description: Enables resizing windows by dragging on borders and gaps

title: Extend Border Grab Area
name: general:extend_border_grab_area
description: Expands the area around borders for resizing (works with resize_on_border)

title: Hover Icon on Borders
name: general:hover_icon_on_borders
description: Shows a cursor icon when hovering over borders (works with resize_on_border)

title: Allow Tearing
name: general:allow_tearing
description: Master switch for allowing tearing to occur

title: Rounded Corners
name: window:rounding
description: Radius of rounded corners for windows (in layout pixels)

title: Active Window Opacity
name: window:active_opacity
description: Opacity of active windows (0.0 - 1.0)

title: Inactive Window Opacity
name: window:inactive_opacity
description: Opacity of inactive windows (0.0 - 1.0)

title: Fullscreen Window Opacity
name: window:fullscreen_opacity
description: Opacity of fullscreen windows (0.0 - 1.0)

title: Drop Shadows
name: window:drop_shadow
description: Enable drop shadows on windows

title: Shadow Range
name: window:shadow_range
description: Range (size) of shadows in layout pixels

title: Shadow Render Power
name: window:shadow_render_power
description: Power of shadow falloff (1-4, higher means faster falloff)

title: Ignore Window for Shadow
name: window:shadow_ignore_window
description: Render shadow only around window, not behind it

title: Shadow Color
name: window:col.shadow
description: Color of shadows (alpha controls opacity)

title: Inactive Shadow Color
name: window:col.shadow_inactive
description: Color of shadows for inactive windows (falls back to col.shadow if unset)

title: Shadow Offset
name: window:shadow_offset
description: Rendering offset for shadows

title: Shadow Scale
name: window:shadow_scale
description: Scale of shadows (0.0-1.0)

title: Dim Inactive Windows
name: window:dim_inactive
description: Enable dimming of inactive windows

title: Dim Strength
name: window:dim_strength
description: Amount to dim inactive windows (0.0-1.0)

title: Dim Special Workspace
name: window:dim_special
description: Amount to dim other windows when a special workspace is open (0.0-1.0)

title: Dim Around Rule
name: window:dim_around
description: Amount to dim other windows when using the dimaround rule (0.0-1.0)

title: Screen Shader
name: window:screen_shader
description: Path to a custom shader to apply at the end of rendering

title: Enabled
name: decoration:blur:enabled
description: Enable Kawase window background blur

title: Blur Size
name: decoration:blur:size
description: Distance of blur (in pixels)

title: Blur Passes
name: decoration:blur:passes
description: Number of blur passes to perform

title: Ignore Window Opacity
name: decoration:blur:ignore_opacity
description: Make blur layer ignore window opacity

title: New Optimizations
name: decoration:blur:new_optimizations
description: Enable advanced blur optimizations (recommended for performance)

title: Xray Mode
name: decoration:blur:xray
description: Floating windows ignore tiled windows in blur (requires blur_new_optimizations)

title: Noise Level
name: decoration:blur:noise
description: Amount of noise to apply to blur (0.0-1.0)

title: Contrast Modulation
name: decoration:blur:contrast
description: Contrast modulation for blur (0.0-2.0)

title: Brightness Modulation
name: decoration:blur:brightness
description: Brightness modulation for blur (0.0-2.0)

title: Vibrancy
name: decoration:blur:vibrancy
description: Increase saturation of blurred colors (0.0-1.0)

title: Vibrancy Darkness
name: decoration:blur:vibrancy_darkness
description: Strength of vibrancy effect on dark areas (0.0-1.0)

title: Blur Special Workspace
name: decoration:blur:special
description: Blur behind the special workspace (note: expensive)

title: Keyboard Model
name: input:kb_model
description: Appropriate XKB keymap parameter. See the note below.

title: Keyboard Layout
name: input:kb_layout
description: Appropriate XKB keymap parameter

title: Keyboard Variant
name: input:kb_variant
description: Appropriate XKB keymap parameter

title: Keyboard Options
name: input:kb_options
description: Appropriate XKB keymap parameter

title: Keyboard Rules
name: input:kb_rules
description: Appropriate XKB keymap parameter

title: Keyboard File
name: input:kb_file
description: Path to a custom .xkb file, if preferred

title: Numlock by Default
name: input:numlock_by_default
description: Engage numlock by default

title: Repeat Rate
name: input:repeat_rate
description: The repeat rate for held-down keys, in repeats per second

title: Repeat Delay
name: input:repeat_delay
description: Delay before a held-down key is repeated, in milliseconds

title: Mouse Sensitivity
name: input:sensitivity
description: Sets the mouse input sensitivity (-1.0 to 1.0)

title: Cursor Acceleration Profile
name: input:accel_profile
description: Sets the cursor acceleration profile (adaptive, flat, custom)

title: Force No Acceleration
name: input:force_no_accel
description: Force no cursor acceleration (not recommended)

title: Left-Handed Mode
name: input:left_handed
description: Switches RMB and LMB

title: Scroll Points
name: input:scroll_points
description: Sets the scroll acceleration profile for custom mode

title: Scroll Method
name: input:scroll_method
description: Sets the scroll method (2fg, edge, on_button_down, no_scroll)

title: Scroll Button
name: input:scroll_button
description: Sets the scroll button (int, 0 means default)

title: Scroll Button Lock
name: input:scroll_button_lock
description: Enable scroll button lock (press once to scroll)

title: Natural Scroll
name: input:natural_scroll
description: Inverts scrolling direction

title: Follow Mouse Focus
name: input:follow_mouse
description: Specify how cursor movement affects window focus (0/1/2/3)

title: Mouse Refocus
name: input:mouse_refocus
description: Disable refocusing on hovered window unless crossing a boundary (requires follow_mouse=1)

title: Float Switch Focus Override
name: input:float_switch_override_focus
description: Change focus to window under cursor when switching tiled/floating (1) or also on float-to-float (2)
